section.name: LoggerLayoutSimple
section.p: LoggerLayoutSimple is a basic layout which outputs only the level followed by the message.
It is interesting to note that the output of LoggerLayoutSimple is identical to that of LoggerLayoutPattern with the conversion pattern set to %p - %m%n.

subsection.name: Parameters
subsection.p: This layout does not have any configurable parameters.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.pre: INFO - My first message. DEBUG - My second message. WARN - My third message.
